name: A Turnabout Called Justice
summary: Months after the conclusion of the trial of Athena Cykes, Trucy Wright has finally regained the Gramarye Rights and plans a brand new show to revive the Gramarye Miracle. What follows is a devastating accident-turned-murder, leaving it up to Apollo Justice and Athena Cykes to find justice or doom the legal system to darkness forever.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: A Turnabout Called Justice [FT] Part 1: The Gramarye Revival
